note.p: Birth: Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk, England (17 September 1771)
Death: Bury St Edmunds, Suffolk (26 November 1852)
Education: Christ's College, Cambridge. BA (1793), MA (1796)
Career: Fellow of Christ's College, Cambridge; Preacher, St Mary's, Bury St Edmunds (1802); Rector, Braiseworth (1812); Rector, Horringer, Suffolk (1812); became partially paralysed (1842)
